context.p: Create a new team for the Capacity Planner

info.p: Click the team view from the nav bar at the top.
Click the Create new team button
Enter the team name in the input box.
NOTE: Team names cannot exceed 50 characters
Click the Save button and you will be redirected back to the previous page where you can see the newly created team with new options to edit and delete that team.
NOTE: Team will not save if any fields are invalid (RED in UI)

result.p: A New Team is created in the Capacity Planner.
